thumb.title: Downpour/GUMI
thumb.description: Lyrics, composition, arrangement, and instrument recording by XilinC ❤Vocal: GUMI (Synthesizer V)I wrote the lyrics for this song around last September, and the initial demo of the melody came together when the new semester started this February. I really like this song, so I finally made up my mind to finish it. The guitar arrangement is done, though my playing feels clumsy and lacking. The bass line is also quite simple. But you know, I’m genuinely happy—it feels like I’ve taken a real step forward. If I ever get the chance to be in a band again in the future, I’ll definitely, definitely perform this song!
